channel.title: Astrect - "Arguably, the most unique private server"
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/5276/astrect.png[/img][/center]
[hr]
[size=20pt][b]Introduction:[/b][/size]
Hello! It is time for a new server, not just any crappy #317 loading #600+, and certainly not a remake that is going to fail. Exploration is based on the Project Insanity Server base, created by Sanity. The reason we chose this base, is because it is very easy to work with and we do not have to add a lot of content, like if we were to use another base. i.e: Hyperion, RuneSource, or Apollo.
[hr]
[size=20pt][b]Information:[/b][/size]
We are not here to provide "perfect combat & switching", "a perfect economy", etc. Yes, these are important factors in making a server, and they will be worked on, but we are focusing more on the custom-quest and content side. We are here to provide great game play filled with adventures, i.e: TONS of Quests, loads of content, and most importantly, fun.
[hr]
[size=20pt][b]Goals:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]A custom story line which will lead each player to their destiny.[/li] [li]Over 15 mini-quests[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[size=20pt][b]The team:[/b][/size]
[ul][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=468771]arham 4[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=568853]Sibor[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=558961]Mystic-Effect[/url][/li][/ul]
[hr]
[size=20pt][b]Media:[/b][/size]
[img]http://imgboot.com/images/RsPsGuru/exploration.gif[/img] [img width=700]http://imgboot.com/images/RsPsGuru/ad.png[/img] [img]http://imgboot.com/images/RsPsGuru/ad1.png[/img]

item.title: Astrect - "Arguably, the most unique private server"
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“KempiScape, post:27, topic:447476”]to be honest, in my opinion it looks terrible. that is what i can see from the picture, haven’t actually logged in so i might be wrong. Just like to remember you, private servers are private servers for a reason, i know little players who like to follow quest story lines even though from a developer perspective they are cool.

Good luck either way[/quote]

[quote=“arham 4, post:26, topic:447476”]Actually going to transform this server into one of my master plans. Its going to be a 718 though, but you all know me. I don’t just leech and done.

Its name is also going to change to World 901.[/quote]

Lil_Smok3r:

Best of luck Arham!

Thanks.
You never get on Skype.

Read full topic

Just like to remember you, private servers are private servers for a reason, i know little players who like to follow quest story lines even though from a developer perspective they are cool.

Good luck either way

item.title: Astrect - "Arguably, the most unique private server"
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You should make the client match the server, seeing as the server is 317 protocol, and that is a 474 (IIRC) game frame. You’ll run into problems that can be easily avoided by connecting the two. (Or just using a base that has it right), but nevertheless I wish everything good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Astrect - "Arguably, the most unique private server"
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

A lot is spelled wrong on the website, good luck guys :).

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:3, topic:447477”]Not much server progress today, mainly website.

We now have a Twitter like navigation bar, it is in a fixed position on the webpage. That means, if you scroll to the bottom of the page, the navigation bar will stay at the same position. To make navigation faster.
New background and sliding images are complete.

I’ll post pictures tomorrow.

EDIT: Implemented my Task Manager and did a 150 player stress test on my shitty pc (Windws 7, 32 bit, Intel Celeron CPU 2.00 GHz, 1 GB RAM. 1 Core)(It is all I have in Pennsylvania…:(), took 11ms to complete the cycle, with annoying shouting npcs, ~500 spawned npcs, spawned ground items, and objects.[/quote]

What was the engine load? And the server crashed at 150 players?

Read full topic
